name: KINETIC SABATON
description: A heavy redesign of a mech’s locomotion systems, coupled with graviton generators, can provide a staggering impact as the machine puts its entire rapidly accelerating weight behind the blow.

name: ACCELERATION SPEAR
description: The iconic weapon of the SAE Enterprise, this large bladed spear has obtained quite a bit of attention for the speed and agility of which it can be used. The sheer scale of it should make it an incredibly unwieldy weapon but the incredible balance and variable weight allows for nearly impossible grace.
effect: This weapon may use the Light profile to Skirmish and Overwatch. You gain the Ascalon Impact Full Action.

actions.name: ASCALON IMPACT
actions.detail: Expend 1 CP to make a thrown melee attack with the Acceleration Spear against a character within range 50 and line of sight. On hit: the target takes 3d6+4 AP Kinetic damage and is impaled with the spear. While impaled they are shredded, impaired and immobilized until the spear is removed by them or an adjacent character passing a hull save as a full action or the owner of the spear retrieving it as normal for a thrown weapon. These conditions cannot be ended other than by removing the spear.If you miss the target, core power is not expended though the spear must still be retrieved.

profiles.name: HEAVY
profiles.effect: When the Acceleration Spear is thrown, it affects a Line 8 area, placing the weapon in the final space or as close as possible.
profiles.on_attack: Choose to attack in either Heavy mode or Light mode.

profiles.name: LIGHT
profiles.on_attack: Choose to attack in either Heavy mode or Light mode.

name: CANISTER CANNON
description: Simple but effective, Canister Cannons propel containers of Vandenberg paste towards targets at such a speed that they burst and deliver their payload across a wide area.

name: REVOLVER SILO
description:
“But why use revolver chambers? They’re reliable but they’re outdated.”
“Because it is really stylish.” - Discussion between SAE and ART R&D Teams.

actions.name: THERMODYNAMIC REVOLUTION
actions.detail:
Expend 1 CP. The chambers of the Revolver Silo begin to spin, preparing to unleash all chambers at a moment's notice. The next time this scene you attack with the Revolver Silo, you can target up to 5 blast 1 areas in range that cannot overlap, gaining 2 heat for each area past the first. You may choose a different mode for each area.
If you reach the end of the scene without using the Revolver Silo, you regain 1 CP.

profiles.name: ENDOTHERMIC
profiles.on_attack: Choose to fire in either Endothermic mode or Exothermic mode.
profiles.on_hit: The target must pass an engineering save or be frozen in ice and immobilized. They can end this condition by passing a hull save as a quick action to break out of the ice but cannot otherwise end this condition. Each character can only be immobilized this way once per scene.

profiles.name: EXOTHERMIC
profiles.on_attack: Choose to fire in either Endothermic mode or Exothermic mode.
profiles.on_hit: The target is covered in volatile accelerant until the end of their next turn. During that time whenever they gain heat, including from this attack, they take an equal amount of burn.

name: SKYWARD UPPERCUT
description: To resist nearlight bolts, most modern ships require a quick burst of gravitons to negate the sheer kinetic forces upon internals. Scirocco Advanced Engineering, ever interested in interesting uses of such technology, have developed advanced strike plate modifications for a mech's manipulators to apply that sort of force to an unfortunate and soon to be airborne target.
on_hit: The target must pass a Hull save or be knocked 6 spaces directly up; falling as normal at the end of the turn.

name: "WITCHBOLT" LASER PISTOL
description: The name of this weapon comes from opposition claims that what it does must clearly be sorcery rather than the work of science, this long barrel laser pistol's near-supernatural accuracy comes from its targeting system tracking gravitational waves rather than relying on visual indicators.

name: "SPELLSLINGER" MARKSMAN LASER
description: A powerful chemical laser tied to a similar targeting system to the Witchbolt Pistols, the most notable fact of the spellslinger isn’t its incredible stopping power or accuracy but how durable and smooth the weapon’s overengineered loading mechanism is, able to be used by skilled operators to have another chemical round chambered before the last one has finished falling to the ground.

actions.name: FREESHOOTER
actions.detail:
Expend 1 CP. For the rest of the Scene, the Spellslinger's 'On Critical Hit' effect is replaced with:

On a Critical Hit, or if this attack destroys a target that had full HP: Reload this weapon and immediately make a secondary attack against a different target within range. You can continue making secondary attacks on critical hits or destroyed full HP targets, as long as there are new, valid targets within range. Characters can’t be hit more than once with the same firing of this weapon.

name: "COMET" HEAVY BOMBER
description: Designed for strategic bombing campaigns, Comets are armed with a payload of heavy munitions tailored to bring even the most reinforced bunkers and factories down upon the heads of the defenders.
effect: This weapon deals 30 AP Explosive Damage to objects, cover, terrain, and the environment.

name: "METEOR" HYPERVELOCITY FIGHTER
description: A Subaltern Air Superiority Fighter armed with light laser cannons and capable of reaching levels of acceleration that would kill any living pilot, the Meteor can strike a foe and return to launch before a target even knows they are under assault.
effect: Reactions cannot be taken against attacks by this weapon.

name: "ASTEROID" STRIKE CRAFT
description:
A need for a powerful close air support craft led to the creation of the Asteroid, a subaltern aerospace attack craft nearly as large as small mechs and armed with a powerful gatling laser. The hum of the Asteroid in action has become almost memetic, with many omninet videos devoted to onomatopoeia of the gatling laser at full spin.

In the most dire circumstances, the Asteroid can be quickly retrofitted to carry a single bomb of unmatched destructive potential. Every use of such bombs will however result in a full investigation of the circumstances by SAE’s internal affairs department, often with DOJ/HR oversight.
on_attack: You can gain 4 Heat. If you do, the weapon does not become unloaded.

actions.name: DEFCON 1
actions.detail: Expend 1 CP. Choose a space within Range 50; All characters know it has been chosen. The Strike Craft is sent on a bombing run to this space armed with an Antimatter Bomb that detonates at the end of next Round, creating a Blast 4 Explosion. Characters within the affected area must succeed on an Agility save or take 1 structure damage. On a success, they are reduced to 1 HP. Objects in the affected area are completely annihilated.

name: CRUSHING GRIP
description: Heavy industrial reinforcement of a mech’s manipulators turns them into terrifying weapons that can easily mangle even the toughest of frames.

name: "PULSAR" MISSILE POD
description: Exchanging high explosives for a solid warhead, Pulsars are designed to slam into the target with enough force to rattle even seasoned pilots and send multi-tonne warmachines stumbling.

name: "SHATTERPOINT" ROCKET BATTERY
description: A class of weapon more than a single type, Shatterpoint Rockets are a variety of anti-armour projectiles designed to destabilize the latest advancements in defensive upgrades. To increase efficiency, they are coupled with an expert system allowing rapid analysis and countering of any new materials encountered.
on_hit: The target must pass an engineering save or be shredded until the end of its next turn.

name: VIBROKATAR
description: Slim punching daggers, vibrokatars are designed to take advantage of their ability to be leveraged against soft internal components of an unaware target.
effect: Against Grappled targets or if you started your turn Hidden, this weapon deals maximum possible damage and bonus damage.

name: FREEZE RAY
description: "Cold Gun? Oh, no. This doesn’t create cold, it stops atoms dead. The cold is just a side effect of that, Absolute Zero. Do be careful with that plating, it's gonna be a bit brittle." -Siani 137, SAE Artificer
on_hit: The target clears all burn and heat; and is immobilized and Shredded until the end of their next turn.

name: VOID BLADE
description: Only a blade by the most broad definition, this resembles nothing more than a dark slice of empty space, hungry for the material it lacks.
effect: Reactions cannot be taken against attacks from this weapon and its damage cannot be reduced by any means.Gain the One With Nothing Full Action.

actions.name: ONE WITH NOTHING
actions.detail:
Expend 1 CP. Teleport up to 5 spaces then make an attack with the Void Blade against a character within Threat. On a hit, teleport up to 5 spaces and make a secondary attack against a different character within Threat. You can continue teleporting and making secondary attacks on hits, as long as there are new, valid targets within threat after each teleport; however, secondary attacks can’t deal bonus damage and characters can’t be hit more than once with this core power.

One With Nothing does not consume limited charges of the Void blade and if you miss all targets, core power is not consumed.

name: GAUSS SUBMACHINE GUN
description: For personal use, SAE often prefers coil guns to railguns. Both are capable of producing incredible projectile speeds but coilguns are more durable and less subject to wear with every movement and shot. This allows them to be used in automatic weapons, while fully automatic rail weapons are highly temperamental and prone to failure after a few seconds of fire.

profiles.name: STANDARD MODE
profiles.on_attack: Choose to fire in either Standard Mode or Sweep Mode.

profiles.name: SWEEP MODE
profiles.on_attack: Choose to fire in either Standard Mode or Sweep Mode.

name: "HAILFIRE" ASSAULT GYROJET
description: Gyrojets are seen by many as a dead end design-wise, as the need for the rockets to reach full speed after leaving the barrel makes them less effective for infighting then many comparable weapons. Scirocco Advanced Engineering has never been one to resist a challenge and the Hailfire has defied most expectations, using a powerful coilgun to provide initial velocity before the gyrojets themselves take over propulsion. Combined with an impressive rate of fire this gives the Hailfire an unexpectedly effective profile at all ranges.
effect: This weapon is a Launcher in addition to being a CQB.
on_hit: The target is Impaired until the end of this turn.
